Zvezda bez trojice igrača u Zagrebu
02 Nov 2019, 14:33 by Milos
Crvena zvezda, osokoljena pobedom protiv Himkija, gostuje Ciboni u okviru petog kola ABA lige. Utakmica u Zagrebu na programu je u nedelju, 3. novembra od 18 časova.
Trener crveno-belih Andrija Gavrilović pozvao je na oprez pred duel sa „vukovima“ i naglasio da ne može da računa na trojicu igrača.
– Utakmica sa Cibonom je ozbiljan ispit i ništa lakši zadatak od evroligaške utakmice. Utakmica koje igramo sa timovima koji se bore za statust u ABA ligi nikada nisu bile niti će biti lak zadatak, i ovoj utakmici prilazimo upravo tako. Da bi došli do pobede koja nam je neophodna potrebna nam je maksimalna koncentacija i angažovanje celog tima. Na ovoj utakmici neću moći da računam na Derika Brauna, Dejana Davidovca i Nemanju Nenadića, rekao je Gavrilović, a preneo klupski sajt.
Boriša Simanić je istakao da je za pobedu potrebna maksimalna koncentracija i angažovanost igrača.
– Utakmicu sa Himkijem smo ostavili iza nas odmah po njenom završetku, ali treba da se vraćamo na nju kao pokazatelj sa kakvom energijom i željom moramo da uđemo i u utakmicu sa Cibonom. Poznajemo ekipu Cibone, moramo maksimalno angažovano da uđemo u tu utakmicu, sa identičnom energijom kao u meču sa Himkijem, i verujem da rezultat onda neće izostati, dodao je mladi krilni centar.

A star without three players in Zagreb
02 Nov 2019, 14:33 by Milos
The Red Star, crowned with a win against Khimki, is hosting Ciboni as part of the fifth round of the ABA League. The Zagreb match is on the program on Sunday, November 3rd from 6 pm.
Red and white coach Andrija Gavrilovic called for caution before a duel with the Wolves and stressed that he could not count on three players.
- The match with Cibona is a serious exam and no easier task than a Euroleague match. The games we play with the ABA League stats teams have never been or will be an easy task, and we approach this game just like that. To get the victory we need, we need maximum concentration and engagement from the whole team. At this game I will not be able to count on Derrick Brown, Dejan Davidovac and Nemanja Nenadic, said Gavrilovic, who uploaded the club site.
Borisa Simanic stressed that winning requires maximum concentration and commitment from players.
- We left the match with Khimki immediately after its completion, but we should return to it as an indicator with what energy and desire we have to enter the match with Cibona. We know the Cibona team, we need to be as engaged as possible in this match, with the same energy as in the match with Khimki, and I believe that the result will not be missed then, the young winger added.
